text: 10:19 Khong 20:13; Aniwa 5:17; Khong 20:14; Aniwa 5:18; Khong 20:15; Aniwa 5:19; Khong 20:16; Aniwa 5:20; Khong 20:12; Aniwa 5:16‘Mi hatkanu, mitu miwa lannaganu, huran-ganu, aranba sakhi piganu, minamganu, amasung nama napabu ikai khumnou’ haiba Mapu Ibungogi wayel yathangsing asi nahakna khang-i.”
